name: Shravan
desc: Thirdeye's track and trace application has been a game-changer for us. The seamless integration with our ERP system and the real-time monitoring capabilities have dramatically improved our workflow and visibility. We are now able to manage production stages efficiently and proactively address bottlenecks.
